thread.title: You can now shop these cult fave flower lip balms at Forever 21
thread.title_full: You can now shop these cult fave flower lip balms at Forever 21

author: Amanda Grace
title: You can now shop these cult fave flower lip balms at Forever 21
text:
You can now shop these cult fave flower lip balms at Forever 21 Forever 21 is no longer just a place to grab a quick pair of leggings or trendy heels! The affordable beauty retailer has recently added BIG names to their cosmetics roster, including the Balm cosmetics, Jouer, and WINKY LUX Flower Balms ! If you haven’t seen these babies, prepare to be dazzled. The beauty cult fave is a clear balm encasing a delicate little flower . We definitely had a Beauty and The Beast moment when we first saw them! 
The Winky Lux Flower Balms are available for $14, each! Florals for spring...groundbreaking....no for real, these are actually groundbreaking. Green is our second best selling Flower Balm color. Whats your favorite? #flowerbalm #itsawinkyworld : by the lovely @everythingsrosiex 
A post shared by Winky Lux (@winky_lux) on Feb 21, 2017 at 4:58pm PST 
How gorgeous are those lipsticks? We’ll definitely be stocking up!
Jouer’s fan favorite liquid lipsticks and glossy toppers are currently sold at Forever21.com NOW, for $16 to $18. The rich, creamy formulas are highly pigmented and a favorite among beauty bloggers like Hallie Barber .
@hailiebarber wearing Skinny Dip over #sigmabeauty Lipstick in Go Dutch! ✨ #jouergirl 
A post shared by Jouer Cosmetics (@jouercosmetics) on Feb 22, 2017 at 12:29pm PST 
Longtime cult faves, theBalm, are instantly recognizable by their vintage inspired packaging, and now F21 carries eyeshadow palettes and highlighters that range from $15 to $36!
Just another Monday at the office #theBalm 
A post shared by theBalm Cosmetics (@thebalm_cosmetics) on Feb 6, 2017 at 12:45pm PST 
We love the Nude Dude eyeshadow palette , which has a variety of both light and deep hues. With 12 shades and a double ended brush, Nude Dude Vol. 2 is a total steal for under $40.
Forever 21’s website is a treasure trove of beauty products! Guess what!! @jouercosmetics and @thebalm_cosmetics are online at @forever21 website! They also have @girlactik which I posted about a month ago I think. @forever21 is starting to sell makeup which is cool because I always tend to forget to buy clothes! Does anyone have that problem? I buy more makeup then clothes so there's times I have nothing to wear. It's only the lip toppers and some lip crèmes that are online for @jouercosmetics #maryloumanizer and the other #Highlighter are online as well as Nudetude #eyeshadowpalette #jouercosmetics #lipstickjunkie #thebalmcosmetics #forever21 #makeupaddict #makeupwhore #makeupislife #makeupjunkie #makeupporn #instaguru #instamakeup #instabeauty #beautyguru #beautyqueen #beautyblogger #bbloggers #beautybloggers #slave2beauty #makeup #beauty #fiercesociety #makeuppage #igbeauty #makeupmafia 
A post shared by Gaby Vega (@g_glowbeauty) on Feb 23, 2017 at 5:02am PST 
In their store, Forever 21 has their own branded cosmetics, as well under affordable beauty faves like e.l.f Cosmetics and NYX Cosmetics. With an expanding selection of brands and Korean spa products, we are so excited to see F21 is adding more items to their store!
Get your glow on like @_alyssamay! ✨ P.S. as a beauty hack - use a lip balm to create the perfect glossy lid for that "no-makeup" makeup look! (Shop link in bio) 
A post shared by forever21 (@forever21) on Feb 22, 2017 at 3:46pm PST 
From shoes to clothes to cosmetics, Forever 21 truly is becoming a one stop shop! Check out their website , and treat yourself to some makeup goodies. Why not? It’s Friday!
